songs.title: Now I’m Following You, Pt. 1
songs.album: I’m Breathless (Music From And Inspired By The Film Dick Tracy)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Madonna]
Let's dance, you can do a little two-step
I'll go anywhere that you step to
'Cause I'm following you

[Verse 2: Warren Beatty]
My feet might be fallin' out of rhythm
Don't know what I'm doin' with 'em
But I know I'm following you

[Chorus: Madonna and Warren Beatty]
Unlikely as it is to me
On the floor with two left feet
Let's boogie woogie till our hearts skip a beat
But who's counting?
Encore
Once again around the dance floor
Romance is in the picture too, now I'm following you

[Spoken: Madonna]
Take it away, boys

[Tap Solo]

[Chorus: Madonna and Warren Beatty]
Unlikely as it is to me
On the floor with two left feet
Let's boogie woogie till our hearts skip a beat
But who's counting?
Encore
Once again around the dance floor
Romance is in the picture too, now I'm following you
